text: Nde nza phorgap guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigi, kha Zudaiŋ nza mbuim, nza tuga tɨvaneŋra nde thav, khar kav, nza kha ndɨkndɨga mbui, ndia won tari thav, samra ki. Nza nden ŋkoo gari fhuvara, nzan ndɨkndɨgi gum nzan ndavi vheri nde phorga ki. Nza maaŋ muuŋgiap taagi nde ganɨ zav tuavi ndi garav ŋaara mbatɨga mbuav khar ki. Nza guigira nde gangirga vuzvuk bakɨme nzan ki.
